      • addNewCustomer

        public static boolean addNewCustomer(long id,
                     java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String firstName,
                     java.lang.String lastName,
                     java.lang.String addressLine1,
                     java.lang.String addressLine2,
                     java.lang.String city,
                     java.lang.String state,
                     java.lang.String zipCode,
                     java.lang.String emailAddress,
                     java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                     java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                     java.lang.String creditCardExpirationDate)
        Adds a new customer to the database
        Parameters:
        id - the ID
        userName - the user name
        password - the password
        firstName - the first name
        lastName - the last name
        addressLine1 - the first line of the address
        addressLine2 - the second line of the address
        city - the city
        state - the state
        zipCode - the zip code
        emailAddress - the email address
        phoneNumber - the phone number
        creditCardNumber - the credit card number
        creditCardExpirationDate - the credit card expiration date
        Returns:
        the result of successfully creating a new customer
